job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pTyto Athene GSI has an opening for a Data Scientist to support JADC2ABMS concept and capability developmentnbspPosition is located in Fairborn OH and also assist with network planning for JADC2ABMS related events and execution of network related task ordersnbspGSI will compete to develop and field networks for JADC2ABMS programs Design cloudbased data repositories across domains that are discoverable enabling publish subscribe approaches servicing various consumers across the DoD These repositories contain data that consists of structured and unstructured data and where possible this data will be meta tagged for further analytics and as well as fusion purposes Propose machine learning and further enhance the artificial intelligence AI algorithms to provide previously unrealized military utility in decision aidesppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliPerforms technical sales support as the Data Scientist for the ABMS program teamnbspliliAuthors concept papers and technical proposals in response to JADC2ABMS acquisition requestsnbspnbspliliDevelops solutions for complex data sets across multiple security levelsliliParticipates in JADC2ABMS related planning activitiesnbspProposes data integration solutions for lead DoD planners and executes upon approvalliliCollaborates within GSI ABMS team to create unique state of the art solutions across ABMS developmental categoriesliliCollaborates within to translate and deliver commercial solutions to meet DoD use case demandsliliCoordinates within to evolve commercial solutions to meet unique DoD requirementsliliCollaborates with industry partners to broaden reach and when necessary leverage non solutions to deliver the best available solutions for DoDliliDesigns and develops methods processes and systems to consolidate and analyze data both structured and unstructured and its sources including big datanbspliliDevelops and uses advanced software programs algorithms querying and automated
